description: Fixed OpenSearch temp directory creation causing startup failures

changelog.7.1.1: Initial release - Core architecture, user management, case framework
changelog.7.1.2: Bugfix - Fixed requirements.txt copying and added fallback dependency installation
changelog.7.1.3: Bugfix - Fixed database path to absolute, improved service status checks, added Nginx troubleshooting
changelog.7.1.4: Bugfix - Fixed OpenSearch demo config issues, updated python-evtx to 0.8.1, disabled security plugin properly
changelog.7.1.5: Bugfix - Fixed OpenSearch temp directory creation, ensures all required directories exist
